name: Drug Driver
description:
Explore the journey of a questionable hero ; a man who has to drive from Mexico to the US to deliver cocaine. You will be confronted with a series of mini game, you must be quick. Use your mouse and the left and right clicks to resolve the challenges. This game is inspired by 80s aesthetic and contains depictions of prostitutes and drug use. 

Hello ! 

This is a game that we produced for the Global Game Jam ! The theme was "Transmission" ! 

We are 5 students in first year of Game Design in Bellecour Ecole, Lyon, France. 

The team was : 

Mathis BRESSAUD : Programmer / Game Designer

Severin JACOB : Sound Designer / Game Designer

Hugo LEANG: Programmer / Game Designer

Léonard SAVIO : Lead / Game Designer

Erwann SIGUAUD : Artist / Game Designer

Hope you enjoy !
